ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: For undergrads - this class is a good opportunity to see how sociology research is done firsthand and to understand everything that goes into the publication of an article. At least this year, there wasn't a whole lot of additional work beyond reading and critiquing the weekly papers, and I think having some additional work/readings might have helped me learn more. On the whole, though, it is definitely interesting if you are a sociology mahjor.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Good to see different ways of presenting research and practicing discussing topics beyond one's own area of interest
